attributes.title: Don’t waste your time
attributes.review: This is the worst political app I ever downloaded. This is the man who split America even more then what it already was. As are president he’s supposed to bring us together or in his word “Make America Great Again”. If that’s his favorite line why haven’t I seen it happen.

attributes.title: Trump? More like CHUMP
attributes.review: This app really made my entire phone swim in the bathtub🤦🏽‍♀️ then my toes ran away from me causing my brother to punch my mom, I started to go take out the trash when I saw a fish walking a dog then I saw the owner and gave him burger then I went to Walmart and got my backpack and jumped into the pool, then went home and went to bed and took a shower with my pajamas on, btw if you voted for Chump then you literally just wanna destroy The U.S.🤤

attributes.title: It ain’t that great
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and it didn’t live up to my expectations AT ALL I’m very disappointed and I expected better:((((( I’m so sad I can’t believe this. It even put a virus on my phone!! It made my fridge freak out and had a panic attack and do you know how hard it is to calm down a fridge! (Hint: very hard) I’m so upset

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!
attributes.review: If I could give this app a zero star I would, matter affect I’m verbally giving this app a zero 👏🏼 After 4 baths, 2 showers and a five day period the app finally downloaded. When I was officially able to open it, it lagged my phone and stole all my photos. Not one left. 🤡

attributes.title: Broken app
attributes.review: This app took 4 hours to download🙄 it even asked for my phone number where I was bombarded with thousands of emails about car insurance and I don’t even own a car. I am absolutely disgusted I even went to go walk to pet fish on the side walk and got another text from the government telling me to drown my fish🤦🏽‍♂️ absolutely horrible

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever because I don’t like trump and trump can go f$&k him self and the wall!!💩💩💩💩

attributes.userName: G e N E R a T i O N z
attributes.title: Ew.
THE WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: This app took way too long to download, and such poor quality when it did download after 24 hours! I DO NOT recommend anyone to download this DISGUSTING app!

attributes.title: Caused my phone to explode!
attributes.review:
Downloaded this app, and it caused my brand new phone to spontaneously combust!! Should be removed immediately! 

Save yourself and don’t download it!
